events.message: I ordered a pair of shoes last week but they arrived in the wrong size. I would like to return them and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The system has identified the case as a Refund request due to the customer's expressed need to return the product for money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request regarding the wrong shoe size shipment.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to return your shoes for a refund because they arrived in the wrong size. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the shoes have been worn or damaged in any way? This information will help us process your return faster.
Sure, my order number is 48723654. The shoes are brand new, I just tried them on inside my home and noticed they don't fit.

Thank you for the details. You can return the shoes to us using the prepaid label I will email shortly. Once we receive the package, we will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for the clear instructions. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the return label email.
I have sent the prepaid return label to your email address. Please let me know if you need further assistance. We are happy to help.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you have successfully returned the shoes and whether the refund process has been completed to your satisfaction.
Yes, I returned the shoes yesterday and received my refund today. Thanks for your help, everything was smooth and easy.
Thank you for confirming. I am closing your case now. Please feel free to reach out if you need any further assistance in the future.
